Included in our price is DAILY housekeeping and turndown service. You will experience the finest of Paradise Valley luxury with the amentities of staying at a hotel!

primaryHost.about: We believe that your vacation is a time to relax, enjoy time with family and friends, and make lasting memories. You deserve an unrivaled luxury experience, and that’s exactly what you’ll get when you book with us. Our exclusive Scottsdale vacation rentals guarantee that you’ll have a vacation to remember.

sectionedDescription.access: Guests have access to every area of the home except for certain storage closets.
sectionedDescription.description:
Experience the delight of residing in this mountainside mansion. Embrace the splendid Scottsdale climate in the resort-style backyard, where you'll find a gleaming pool, breathtaking mountain vistas, a pergola, cozy seating, BBQ facilities, a convenient kitchenette, and a poolside fire pit to enhance your stay.

Step into the epitome of luxury living at this magnificent mountainside mansion. Nestled in the heart of the breathtaking Scottsdale landscape, this residence is designed to exceed your every expectation, offering a blend of opulent comfort and spectacular outdoor living.

The resort-style backyard beckons, boasting a sparkling pool that glistens under the radiant Arizona sun, while the panoramic mountain views serve as an awe-inspiring backdrop. Whether you're lounging in the pergola's shade, indulging in al fresco dining in the comfortable seating area, or savoring meals hot off the BBQ and kitchenette, the ambiance invites pure relaxation. As evening falls, the poolside firepit creates the perfect setting for shared moments and serenity.

Yet, the interior is a testament to sophistication and style. Step inside to discover a sleek and versatile floor plan designed for both unwinding and entertainment. The living room, a hub of comfort and elegance, welcomes you with ample seating, a cozy fireplace, expansive windows framing the magnificent scenery, and a large screen TV—another space to enjoy each other's company against the stunning mountain vistas.

The home continues to astonish with its array of features. From the luxurious primary suite exuding comfort and indulgence to the spacious dining area perfect for hosting unforgettable gatherings, a fully-equipped movie theater for entertainment, a well-appointed gym for wellness, a game room for added fun, and the subtle, yet elegant, modern decor that ties it all together, this residence caters to every facet of upscale living.

This property isn't just a home; it's a luxurious haven that encapsulates a lifestyle of grandeur, comfort, and sophistication. Embrace the privilege of residing in an exceptional mountain retreat, where every element is meticulously designed to exceed even the most discerning expectations. This isn't just a residence; it's an experience—a statement of refined living amidst nature's majestic beauty. Welcome to your new paradise.

Guests have access to every area of the home except for certain storage closets.  

We believe that you deserve an extraordinary vacation experience. When you book this home, you will enjoy unrivaled features, amenities, and services. We provide a five-star check-in and tour of the home, elevated concierge services, immaculate cleanliness standards, deluxe resort-style towels and linens, and access to the best message therapists, personal chefs, tour guides, and childcare in the Scottsdale area.  

When you stay in this luxury home, you’ll be close to the best dining, shopping, recreation and entertainment that the Scottsdale area has to offer.  

-Old Town Scottsdale, known for its shopping, dining, and nightlife, is only 7 miles away.    

-Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport, the state’s main airport, is only 9 miles away.   

-The City of Scottsdale Airport is only 9 miles away.     

-Talking Stick Casino, known for its entertainment and nightlife, is only 9 miles away.    

-OdySea Aquarium, which was voted as the area’s best indoor attraction, is only 8 miles away.    

-Known for its wide variety of luxury stores, Scottsdale Fashion Square is only 7 miles away.    

-The world-class Waste Management Open at Scottsdale TPC is only 10 miles away.    

-Golf enthusiasts will enjoy having over 10 courses within 5-10 miles of the home.    

-The nearest full gym with an option to play tennis and other sports is only 5 miles away.    

-The popular Cactus League stadiums, which offer some of the world’s best spring training, are all within a 15-mile radius. The Giants Spring Training Field is only 9 miles away, The Cubs Spring Training Stadium is 15 Miles away, and The Diamondbacks/Rockies Spring Training field is 7 miles away.

You will have many nearby options for both rideshare and chauffer services.

Because we care about the guest experience, we must ensure that each home is treated with respect for the following guest. Please make sure that you meet the following criteria and agree to the following rules before you book this home:   

You Must be 33 years of age to book this home    

- Pool Heat optional - Additional charge for duration of stay

A signed rental agreement is required to book this home   

NO bachelor parties, weddings, or other events are allowed   

 Standard occupancy is limited to 14 guests - each additional guest up to maximum occupancy of 16 guests is $100 more per person per night    

Exceeding maximum occupancy without prior approval will result in an additional $250 per person per night    

No loud noise after 9 pm. Violation could result in removal without refund.   

A valid credit card is required for all incidentals    

Cancellation of a reservation will result in a loss of all rents paid    

Reservations are non-refundable        

After you book, you will send us your personal email address so we can send you our rental agreement. We will collect a credit card and ID to place on file. In order for us to verify your identity, we must collect a CC. You are agreeing to submit ALL of this information to us after you book. Also, the agreement must be signed within 24 hours of booking.      

Tax License - 21384947
City License - STR-00064L

primaryHost.about:
Mom to 7
Geema to 6
Wife to one! Been waking up to a billion dollars for 28 years now!!!
Dog momma to Boss and Baby
Born and raised here in Mesa,AZ 
I’ve been a Stay At Home Mom for almost 27 years and now a first time business owner 
I live to travel as often as I can
Being outdoors all day is life
Working in my yard brings me peace  
All the power tools in the garage are MINE! I feel possibilities are endless when I’m creating whatever it is that I want with lumber 
I love camping with my kids and now with my grandkids too!
Complete peace is felt when I’m taking in the sun on a beach 
My passions are my family, home decor, and design, everything holidays, hosting events and parties at my home, real-estate, and finding the greatest deals out there
I own and personally operate my own customized car rental company and now I’m a host on Air BNB
I also have a passion for clean cars and providing an upgraded experience for my guests, one that you can not find in other rentals 
I assure you that I will go The Extra Mile! 
I have multiple luxury and high performance vehicles listed now and have many more on their way that will be listed as they come in! 
So go ahead and look to find what else I have. You can find me on the Turo App as Kasandra B
I PROMISE YOU WONT REGRET ALLOWING ME TO TAKE CARE OF YOUR CAR NEEDS WHILE HERE IN SUNNY AZ OR WHEN RENTING MY HOME!!

sectionedDescription.description:
Annabel, by WanderJaunt

At WanderJaunt, it's our mission to provide convenient and comfy homes, wherever you may be! We believe in the power of technology and human empathy to create seamless experiences, offering a variety of services like our virtual front desk and in-house customer support to the tens of thousands of guests we’ve hosted to date. Finding the perfect accommodations shouldn’t be difficult. We’re here to make it easy!

Arizona TPT #: 21190622

Each WanderJaunt comes stocked with all the basics you will need for your stay, and then some! No need to fret over those little details. We provide:

-WiFi
-HDTV equipped with AT&T TV Now
-Fully stocked kitchen, including cookware, dishes and cutlery
-Complimentary coffee
-Bath essentials, linens, hangers, a hair dryer and ironing board

Digital keypad makes entry / exit a breeze.

We will always respect your privacy and leave you to enjoy your WanderJaunt in peace. Should anything come up during your stay - be it the need for extra towels, a light bulb burning out, or even local recommendations - drop us a line anytime! Our support team is standing by to help resolve any and all issues.

Please be aware of the following before booking:

Guests who book on the same day of their arrival may have their check-in time pushed to 7PM or 3 hours after booking - whichever is later.

We also ask all guests to agree to our terms of service, privacy policy, and house rules upon booking on our 3rd party website.
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
play safe!
When you book this reservation, you take full responsibility for any bumps, bruises, accidents, or illnesses that occur in your WanderJaunt and any amenity spaces offered with your WanderJaunt (including, but not limited to gym, pool, etc.). If you notice anything that presents a danger yourself, anyone traveling with you, or your WanderJaunt, please let us know as soon as you check in. *Please note: Breaking any of the following rules will incur a $500 fee. We also ask all guests to agree to our terms of service, privacy policy, and house rules upon booking on our 3rd party website.

change of plans?
If you decide to extend your stay after check-in, please contact us. We will do our best to accommodate you, but no promises!

same-day check-in
Guests who book on the same day of their arrival may have their check-in time pushed to 7PM or 3 hours after booking - whichever is later.

checkout is at 11 am
Late checkouts will delay our cleaning professionals and result in a $50 charge for each hour.

no smoking of any kind
All WanderJaunts are non-smoking units. Leaving behind a smoky WanderJaunt incurs a $500 fine. Please also be aware if the surrounding community is a non-smoking community.

a clean home is a happy home
If your WanderJaunt is left in a messy state beyond what is reasonable, we will charge an extra cleaning fee.

mind the neighbors, please!
Parties AND/or excessive noise ARE NOT allowed in WanderJaunts. Misbehavior costs $500.

no pets allowed
We know you love your fuzzy friends, but this is a trip for you! Our WanderJaunts are for human-use only. Breaking this rule costs $500

stay between 68°f and 80°f
Turning the temperature past these set points can create a system failure and a very uncomfortable stay.

swim at your own risk
Guests agree to waive any responsibility of WanderJaunt and/or the property owner when using the pool and/or hot tub.

sectionedDescription.description:
Welcome to our cozy and private Condominium with a one-car parking garage (standard size car only, tall car will damage the garage door). Addition parking on the street require parking permit. We have a private laundry room next to the unit with key access. We have 1 queen size bed upstairs and 1 sofa bed in the living room. Our place should be able to accommodate 3 guests if 2 are able to share the queen bed.

Our private condo is located in a residential neighborhood of Alhambra. It is within close walking distance to Main Street, a busy and convenient street that will suit all your needs. These amenities range from cafes, bars, banks, markets, and movie theaters. Within a short driving distance, you'll find Target, Costco, and In-N-Out, a popular Southwestern burger place.

sectionedDescription.description:
BEVERLY HILLS VACATION RENTAL HOME GUESTHOUSE 1 BEDROOM STUDIO.  650 sq ft. Private guesthouse in the Upper Beverly Hills flats of Beverly Hills 90210

*WEEKLY AND MONTHLY DISCOUNTS* *RETURNING GUEST DISCOUNTS*

—TESLA CHARGER for daytime charging 

Private locked entry, with a shared back yard.  The 650 sq ft studio fits an individual, a couple, or a family of up to 4  (1 queen bed, 1 full sofa bed, 1 twin sofa bed).  Free street parking  2-3 blocks away from  Beverly Hills (Los Angeles).

Fully equipped private guesthouse fully furnished with stainless steel kitchen appliances. The 650 sq ft studio has a great floor plan to make you feel welcome, safe, and private. 


BEDS:
The Studio guesthouse holds 1 Queen bed, 1 Full size sofa bed, and 1 Twin size sofa bed. High quality mattresses, mattress pads, sheets, blankets and pillows are provided for all 3 beds. Please note: the bedroom is not separated with a door. This is a studio. 


TV & INTERNET:
49" Smart TV with swivel option so you can watch TV from anywhere in the house.  High speed WiFi available throughout the house (you have your own WiFi separate from main house).  


KITCHEN:
Stainless Steel refrigerator/freezer, gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster oven, hot water pot, plates, bowls, cups, pots/pans, cooking utensils, and more.


BATH:
Beautiful vanity with drawers, mirrors and lighting, stand-up shower.  Shampoo, conditioner, body wash, towels, and hair dryer are available.


INDOOR DINING:
Counter height tall square dining table with 4 leather-cushioned chairs.
Kitchen counter has 2 additional leather stools for dining which can be moved to the dining table if desired. 


OUTDOOR DINING:
Various dining areas are available for you to enjoy your meals in fresh air.


CLOSETS:
Lots of closet space available with shelves.  Hanging closets equipped with velvet hangers. Large storage closet for suitcases and bulky items. Iron & ironing board are provided upon request.


GAME BOARDS:
Board games and playing cards are available with prior request. 


CHILDREN: 
Kids are welcome! Depending on age, we have lots of toys and books to keep them busy during your stay.  Please let us know when you reserve if you will require the toys. Children must be supervised at all times inside or outside of the guesthouse. 

LAUNDRY:  Washer/Dryer available.

ACCESSIBILITY: No steps to get into the house. But one small 6 inch step inside after the entrance.  The shower has a step to get inside.

CHECK-IN is at anytime after 3:00 pm. If we don't have a guest prior to your
arrival, check-in could be earlier at no extra charge. 

CHECK-OUT is 11:00 am prompt to avoid an extra night charge. Due to the high demand, and to accommodate other guests, there is a $100 per hour charge past the 11:00 am check out time with no maximum. 

PARKING: 
Tandem parking space to be shared with us MIGHT be available depending on our usage. Otherwise, since Beverly Hills does not allow overnight parking, City of Los Angeles is 2-3 blocks away that allows overnight parking.  Daytime parking in Beverly Hills is permitted on the street. 

TESLA:  Charger is available on most days (daytime only since we most likely don’t have overnight parking space)

ANYTHING ELSE:  If you need anything else, please ask. We will do our best to accommodate your needs.

Outdoor sitting area and dining area inside a large gazebo, with beautiful flowers, plants, and fruitful avocado, grapefruit, and orange trees welcome you during your stay.

We respect your privacy during your stay. If you need anything, please feel free to reach out to us.

Close to all of Beverly Hills, most within a 5-10 minute drive from the house. 

HOTELS:
Beverly Hills Hotel
Bel Air Hotel
Beverly Hilton Hotel
Waldorf Astoria
Beverly Wilshire Hotel

RESTAURANTS:  Beverly Hills restaurants and bars. Ask us about local Happy Hours in the area!

HOSPITALS:  
Cedars Sinai Hospital/Medical Center 
UCLA Hospital 
St John's Hospital

MOVIE STAR HOMES: Tour bus passes by the house daily !!

We find that since we are close to major tourism locations, taxi, or an Uber and Lyft service is more convenient and affordable than car rental.  Please ask us for an Uber discount code if you are not already set-up on Uber.

Street parking in City of Los Angeles is available for overnight parking around 2-3 blocks away.

Parking on our street (City of Beverly Hills) is allowed all day with no limitations, but no overnight parking between 2:00 to 5:00 am. However, Los Angeles is 2-3 blocks away (see map in pictures), where you can park freely and walk to the house. Beverly Hills street signs are white and Los Angeles street signs are blue. 

We suggest you use Uber or Lyft for your comfort. Please ask us for an Uber discount code if you are not already set-up on Uber. 

Daily cleaning services are available on pre-requested days for $75 per occurrence. If you are staying 7 days or longer, weekly cleaning is mandatory and charged $75 per cleaning.  

Pets are welcome with an additional pet charge starting @ $25 per pet per day (not per visit).  All pets must be supervised in the guesthouse and in the back yard all the time and must be house trained.

We have a very friendly and calm 11 year old yellow lab that's part of our family. 

No visitors. No parties.

Please clean up after yourselves. Trash to be taken out daily to the large bins in the front / right corner of the house - entrance through the sidewalk.  

Any damage, breakage or theft will be deducted and/or forfeited from your security deposit or charged on your credit card with Airbnb. 

Lost keys: $175

No smoking, drinking or  recreational drug use.

No guests/visitors permitted.
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
To respect the peace and quietness of the neighborhood, no loud noise/music after 9 pm or before 8 am please.
No guests permitted.     **Please do not flush baby wipes, wipes, paper towels, or feminine products in the toilet.  Any damages will be billed to you **

sectionedDescription.description:
You may never want to leave this beachfront retreat.  This contemporary three-story home on the boardwalk at 35th Street has postcard views.  Full ocean views. Four bedrooms including a third floor bedroom with private bath.

You may never want to leave this beachfront retreat.  This contemporary three-story home on the boardwalk at 35th Street has postcard views.  Full ocean views. Five bedrooms including a third floor bedroom with private bath. 

• Bedroom 1: King bed
• Bedroom 2: Queen bed
• Bedroom 3: Guest room with two twin beds, shared bath.
• Bedroom 4: Guest room with two twin beds, shared bath.
• Bedroom 5: Guest room with two twin beds, shared bath.

Living & Dining 

The open concept living area with a beautiful fireplace to warm the room in winter months and on cool summer evenings.  The fully equipped kitchen, features stainless appliances.  A half bath is conveniently located just off the kitchen.  The laundry room has plenty of room for doing laundry.   

The third story has a private bath with shower, large flat panel TV and access to the rooftop deck.  

Outdoors

Outdoor space becomes an extension of your living space. The rooftop deck has table chairs, and comfortable lounge chairs!  

The Location

The beach at 35th is protected by jetties at 32nd & 36th Streets, making the surf here ideal for all water sports - boogie boarding, surfing, body surfing, skim boarding and swimming.  Dolphins frequently play near the 36th St jetty.  The grocery store and dozens of shops and restaurants are all just a short walk from the home.  The newly re-opened Lido Marina Village boasts high end shopping and dining, with Planet Blue and Nobu, and more affordable options like Circle Hook for fish & chips and Zinque for meals on the waterfront with a European flair.  Malibu Farms offers fresh farm to table cuisine as well as coffee and freshly made ice cream (with vegan options!).  Lido Village Books features reading material of every genre and books by local authors.  Lido Drug across the street is a treasure trove of gifts and hard to find items.  The Lido Theatre, built in 1938, provides a unique venue for movie goers, with black light décor and a balcony for prime viewing of the latest big screen features.  A week will be barely enough time to sample everything the area has to offer.

SLP13260
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
Newport Beach Vacation Properties Process
Welcome to our vacation rental website. Once we have received your email or telephone request one of
our reservation agents will contact you personally, assisting you with all the necessary details to ensure
you secure a vacation rental to meet your needs.
Please note: As our guest you are entering a contractual agreement with a specific property represented
by Burr White Realty. We don’t own any of the properties we represent, however, we make every effort
to represent details accurately. Property details and rates are subject to change.
Lease and Policy:
Once you have selected your vacation home and we have reserved your rental dates a contract will be
electronically sent to you for e-signature. On this lease you will find the following itemized charges:
1. The rental rate.
2. Refundable security deposit or Damage Waiver. *see security deposit policy.
3. Processing/Handling fee – 4-5% of the total rental rate.
4. Housekeeping fee (including professional linen service) – customarily included in the rental rate (some
variations may exist with some owners). Your booking will indicate if additional cleaning charges are to
be deducted from your security deposit.
5. Payment schedule – all payment due dates are clearly stated on page one of your lease.
Please remember, you will be signing a legally binding contract. Please read carefully before signing.

All information on this site is deemed reliable but not guaranteed.

sectionedDescription.description:
Contemporary oceanfront beach house in Malibu

Los Angeles is home to some of America’s most beautiful and prestigious cities, perhaps none more so than Malibu. Twenty-one miles of dynamic coast make up the width of the city limits, most of which is viewable from the iconic Pacific Coast Highway. Built on stilts, right over top of Malibu’s Carbon Beach, this modern and stunning luxury villa is the epitome of the Malibu lifestyle.

Nicknamed “Billionaire’s Beach”, this stretch of coast is home to some of the most amazing architectural achievements in the country, and this private beach home is no exception. Featured in numerous design magazines, this modern rental is thoughtfully decorated with contemporary art, high end appliances, and designer furniture. The living spaces are open concept, flowing freely into each other from the balcony and in. In fact, the entire length of the living room has a floor-to-ceiling windowed door that opens to let the fresh ocean air fill the interior space. The dining area, with seating for ten, and kitchen are located in the main room as well, making it a great space for hosting family and friends.

With accommodations for ten, Carbon Beach is equipped for any occasion. Guests will be entertained by satellite television, Apple TV, Wi-Fi, a sound system, and a foosball table. Outside on the balcony, relax in a sun lounger while you enjoy your panoramic ocean view. Or, take a walk downstairs and see what the water is like with your beachfront access. Later, when the sun has set, Carbons’ primary bedroom has a king sized bed, ensuite, fireplace, and balcony waiting for you. All four of the other bedrooms have king sized beds as well.

If you’d like to get out and enjoy more of Los Angeles County’s beautiful natural features, start with Topanga State Park, located in the mountains of Santa Monica. If you’ve got a golf enthusiast in the group, West Lake and Sherwood Golf Courses are a short drive from Carbon Beach, both are amazingly scenic courses. And of course, nearby cities Beverly Hills, Hollywood, and downtown Los Angeles are all packed with tourist attractions.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.


BEDROOM & BATHROOM
• Bedroom 1 - Primary: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone bathtub, Rain Shower, Dual Vanity, Walk-in Closet, Fireplace, Television, Apple TV, Balcony
• Bedroom 2: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom, Rain Shower, Television, Balcony
• Bedroom 3: King size bed, Shared ensuite bathroom with bedroom 4 & 5, Dual vanity, Rain shower, Television, Balcony
• Bedroom 4: King size bed, Shared access to bathroom with bedroom 3 & 5, Dual vanity, Rain shower, Walk-in Closet, Television, Terrace
• Bedroom 5: King size bed, Shared access to bathroom with bedroom 3 & 4, Television, Terrace

Every guest is a appointed a Personal Concierge, available 24/7

For more than a century, Los Angeles has lured dreamers, vacationers and celebrities alike with its ideal weather. While Hollywood glamor resonates throughout the city of angels, its biggest appeal is its mastery of effortless escapism. Warm year round, with summer time highs reaching an average 84 °F (29 °C) and average winter highs of 68 °F (20 °C). Day time highs can differ as much as 36 °F (20 °C) between coastal and inland regions.

primaryHost.about:
The Maimon Group is a family owned Luxury Property management, Rentals & Concierge services in Los Angeles. 
Our team of certified professionals takes pride in providing 5 star customer service and vacations you will fondly remember forever.

sectionedDescription.access:
Please consider this your home during your stay and also please treat the home and neighbors with respect.

Upon arrival you will be greeted personally by an TMG property manager who will show you around the property, show you how to operate things in the home and answer any questions you might have. At this time you will be given codes, keys/remote.

CHECK IN:
Check-in time is at 4PM, however, if you would like early check-in we have an early check-in fee given there is NOT a same-day check-out.
We are also able to accommodate earlier luggage drop off if you are needed, but you must not return to the property before 4PM. 

CHECK OUT:
Check out is 10:00am.
Please let us know if you need an 11 AM check out, it’s free with a 12-hour notice, given there is not a same-day check-in. 

Any time  after 11AM to 1PM will be a $300 late checkout fee. 
Any time between 1PM to 3PM you will be charged for 50% of the daily rate. 
Any time after 3PM you will be charged for a full day. 
If you plan on extending, payment must be made in full before your 10AM checkout. 

Please leave any keys or remotes on the table by the front door or the kitchen counter when you depart. The owner is strict with this policy due to cleaning schedules and last minute bookings.      

Early check-in requests and late check-out requests are NOT guaranteed. 
Approval is based on availability.
sectionedDescription.description:
This property is only available for monthly stays with a minimum of 31 nights. If you are interested in short-term stays, please contact our concierge for your luxury travel needs.

Two Hollywood Hills Estates Side by Side, with a Total of 11 Bedrooms! 

Perched in the prestigious Hollywood Hills awaits this luxurious, brand-new construction, with unprecedented finishes! Seamless modern design with soaring heights, floor-to-ceiling windows, and tranquil mountain views!

Willow Glen 1
6 bedrooms, 5.5 bathrooms on a multi-level design, cinema room, and wine cellar, embracing the endless open concept of indoor to outdoor living. The lavish master suite boasts private terraces, a master spa embodying an oversized steam shower, soaking tub, and explosive mountain views! A sleek master chef's kitchen has custom contemporary finishes and an expansive center island with top-of-the-line appliances. Harmonious connection to the exceptional living room, dramatic fireplace, dining/family room, and terraces flawlessly opening to outdoor grounds. Immerse in the resort-like outdoor living with a well-appointed saltwater Baja pool, fire pit, and splendor bistro patio.  

Willow Glen 2
Gorgeous 5 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms Hollywood Hills estate. Welcome to this warm contemporary oasis with an open floor plan to enjoy the indoor-outdoor flow of the home. Endless amenities, including theater, sauna, and outdoor basketball hoop. Seamless connection with the large yard, pool, sauna, and detached Guest House. Private and gated. 

INCLUDED WITH YOUR VACATION HOME

All of our luxury vacation rentals at The Maimon Group are fully hotel ready furnished with smart TV’s and high-speed WiFi. Kitchens are equipped with appliances including a refrigerator, microwave, oven, stove, electric kettle, traditional drip coffee maker (ground beans) or Nespresso and toaster. 
Certain properties may have specialty appliances such as a crock pot or Keurig coffee maker. 

Kitchen:
Properties are equipped with the following items to accommodate the max occupancy of the home: 
full dining sets, cooking and serving essentials (including plates, bowls, silverware,) pots, pans, wine and drinking glasses, cooking utensils and kitchen accessories such as can opener, wine opener, measuring spoons and more.  We also provide a spice rack, salt and pepper. 
In some homes we offer cooking essentials or supplies such as: oil, sprays or other cooking ingredients, foil, cling wrap, etc.)

House Supplies:
Your home will come equipped with a starter pack containing essential items such as trash bags, toilet paper, paper towels, a kitchen sponge, hand soap, dish soap, dishwasher pods, laundry pods, and dryer sheets.

Other Items:
The property comes furnished with enough bedding, bath, face, hand, and pool towels to comfortably accommodate the maximum home occupancy. Additionally, the bathrooms are supplied with bottles of shampoo, conditioner, and liquid body/hand wash for your convenience. Furthermore, fully equipped laundry rooms are available, including washing machines, dryers, ironing boards, and irons.

These sophisticated homes are the perfect combination of a serene lifestyle & an unparalleled entertainer retreat with customized convenience! Made for an absolutely idyllic setting with complete privacy with canyon views, perfect for your custom dream palace.

Please consider this your home during your stay and also please treat the home and neighbors with respect.

Upon arrival you will be greeted personally by an TMG property manager who will show you around the property, show you how to operate things in the home and answer any questions you might have. At this time you will be given codes, keys/remote.

CHECK IN:
Check-in time is at 4PM, however, if you would like early check-in we have an early check-in fee given there is NOT a same-day check-out.
We are also able to accommodate earlier luggage drop off if you are needed, but you must not return to the property before 4PM. 

CHECK OUT:
Check out is 10:00am.
Please let us know if you need an 11 AM check out, it’s free with a 12-hour notice, given there is not a same-day check-in. 

Any time  after 11AM to 1PM will be a $300 late checkout fee. 
Any time between 1PM to 3PM you will be charged for 50% of the daily rate. 
Any time after 3PM you will be charged for a full day. 
If you plan on extending, payment must be made in full before your 10AM checkout. 

Please leave any keys or remotes on the table by the front door or the kitchen counter when you depart. The owner is strict with this policy due to cleaning schedules and last minute bookings.      

Early check-in requests and late check-out requests are NOT guaranteed. 
Approval is based on availability.

House rules:
Before you book your stay, please take a moment to review the following house rules. By booking, you acknowledge and agree to abide by these rules throughout your stay. Failure to follow these rules will be considered a violation of your rental agreement.

To ensure a peaceful and respectful experience for all, please keep all noise and music indoors and at a reasonable level at all times, especially during the city’s quiet hours from 9 PM to 8 AM. Our neighbors are particularly sensitive to noise, so it’s important for all guests to be mindful of this and act accordingly throughout the day.

We cannot have any complaints of loud noise or music, guests being disruptive while entering or leaving the property, or excessive noise levels around outdoor or pool areas. We kindly ask all guests to be mindful of this during their stay with us.

Finally, please note that all reservations for groups larger than 10 individuals must be cleared prior to checking in.

Please be aware that any noise violations or parties held on the property are considered a breach of the rental agreement. As a result, The Maimon Group reserves the right to enter the property without advanced notice if any violations occur. In addition, we reserve the right to evict guests in response to any violations of the city ordinance.

NOTE:  Most outdoor music systems are disabled due to previous noise complaints. 
We kindly recommend bringing a Bluetooth speaker, as they are easy to connect and can be placed wherever you prefer. Absolutely no outside music is allowed past 9 PM, and only low-decibel, non-amplified speakers are permitted.

If you are considering hosting an event such as a small wedding, birthday party, or other gathering, please contact us before booking. However, please note that approval of such events cannot always be guaranteed, and any additional fees for holding an event are solely the responsibility of the guest.

VENDORS: 
It is necessary to obtain approval from the property management/Owner prior to allowing any outside vendors into the home. Additionally, guests are kindly requested to provide proof of insurance (COI) for any authorized vendors.

SMOKING: 
Smoking or vaping is strictly prohibited inside the house. If guests choose to smoke, we ask that they do so outside at a safe distance from the main house, and to clean up after themselves. Any evidence of smoking indoors or cigarette butts on the ground outside may result in a $1,000 fee to offset the necessary measures to remove any residual odors. This policy will be strictly enforced.

NOISE METERS
Similar to many vacation rental managers, we utilize decibel readers to alert us when the noise level exceeds the allowed threshold set by our city. Rest assured that our noise meters do not record conversations.
In the event that we receive a noise alert, we will promptly notify you through text and/or phone call. If we do not receive a response, or if the noise level continues to exceed the city limit, we may need to make an in-person visit.

Elevator:
Please be aware that due to manufacturer or user error, we cannot guarantee that the elevator will be in service. Please advise prior to booking if elevator usage is mandatory for your stay.

Security Cameras:
The house is equipped with external civilian security cameras. These are in place for security reasons and covering them is not permitted. Any party found covering the security cameras will be immediately evicted.

Monthly Reservation:
Please note that for reservations lasting 28-31+ days, the client will be responsible for covering the costs of monthly utilities, such as gas, water, power, and others. Additionally, a separate utility deposit will be required.

Pet Policy: 
All pets must be pre-approved and are not guaranteed to be pre-approved. 
An additional pet fee of $250 per pet is in addition to the rate quoted please ask the host. 

Extra-Person: 
Per the City of LA home sharing regulations, overnight guest count is calculated by # of bedrooms x2. Number of overnight guests exceeding this limit will be charged $100+/guest per stay if approved.

Concierge services:  
We are pleased to offer a wide range of amenities to enhance your stay with us, including access to chef services, maids, luxury car rentals, and boat or private jet charters. Additionally, we also provide personal trainers, spa services, and any other amenities you may need during your visit. For convenient access to our Luxury Concierge services, please reach out to us.  

Booking schedule:
To accommodate the preferences of our homeowners, we are unable to book stays for less than five days more than three weeks in advance. Therefore, we kindly request that you send us a message prior to requesting to book to ensure that your desired dates are available.
Please note that some of our properties are currently listed for sale or long-term lease. If you book one of these properties and we are unable to accommodate your reservation due to this reason, property management reserves the right to offer you a full refund or relocate you to another suitable property.

Contacts:
We’re happy to help answer any questions you may have and are available to you via email, phone call, or text message throughout most hours of the day. Additionally, our staff is always nearby in case of emergency.

We kindly request that you provide us with at least two emergency contact phone numbers and email addresses in case of any unexpected occurrences that we may need to contact you for.

ID must be available at check-in for guests registered to this account or an approved replacement.

Guest Verification Notice: 
To ensure a seamless and secure experience for everyone, we now require a simple verification step through Veriff for all our new guests. If we’ve hosted you before, no worries—you might already be in the clear. It’s quick, easy, and helps us ensure everyone’s peace of mind. Additionally, we may request a signed rental agreement.
 
Thanks for your understanding and for being a part of our trusted community.

primaryHost.about:
We are passionate airbnb hosts and travelers who love meeting new people from all over the world! 

We host our own homes and help cohost for others. Each of our properties is unique and offers different things for different groups, we hope you will call one of them home for your trip! Need help hosting your home? Reach out - we'd love to help! IG HelmsBnB

I am from just outside of Boston, MA and moved to Nashville to attend Vanderbilt for grad school. My husband, Justin, went to UNC Chapel Hill for undergrad and Vanderbilt for his MBA. He's been in Nashville since 2010 and loves all things North Carolina related! 

We have been hosts since 2014 and have met so many great people through Airbnb! We've had guests all the way  from Canada, England, Beirut, and Australia! This started as something we did on the side to save for our wedding and honeymoon and has become more of a full time hobby. We are so excited to welcome you to our home!

sectionedDescription.access: Guests have full access to the house and back patio, with the exception of 2 locked storage spaces in the basement.
sectionedDescription.description:
Discover the best of Chicago from our thoughtfully designed, pet-friendly, luxurious townhome - your own oasis for relaxation after exploring the city's vibrant attractions! Located in the heart of the Gold Coast neighborhood and minutes to Lincoln Park and Old Town, you'll have easy access to stunning parks, the beach at Lake Michigan, renowned museums, and trendy shopping. Embrace the perfect balance of urban excitement and relaxation with your private backyard and 2,700 square feet of space.

Immerse yourself in Chicago living at our centrally located, high end spacious townhome. Our home in the Gold Coast neighborhood offers a perfect blend of historic charm, cultural attractions, and a vibrant urban lifestyle with fine dining and boutique shopping. Only 3 blocks away from Red Line station, you can be in the Loop within 20 minutes! A 15 minutes walk to North Avenue Beach and Lincoln Park Zoo and less than a 10 minute walk to world famous Second City. Head into Lincoln Park for some boutique shopping or over to Old Town for the exquisite dining & nightlife. Walk to North Ave, Lincoln Park, and the beach on Lake Michigan!

Main floor 
• Fully stocked eat in chef's kitchen -- Viking oven and gas stove, dishwasher, fridge, toaster, regular drip coffee pot (with complimentary start up coffee & filters), tea kettle, cookware, serveware, dinnerware, etc.
 • Living room – open concept with large windows, stylish and comfy seating, stunning fireplace piece (unfortunately, non functional), along with a 50 inch TV with streaming capabilities. 
• Large dining space that opens to the living room
• Half Bathroom 
• Back patio – private, tranquil, secret garden-esque back patio with outdoor seating

Upstairs
• Primary Bedroom suite with king bed and comfy reading chair, includes an ensuite spa like bathroom with a full shower and soaking tub. 
• 2nd Bedroom with queen bed and desk setup
• 3rd Bedroom with full bed and home office setup with high speed wifi, perfect for working from home (if you must!) 

Basement Level
• Rec room with a large heavenly sectional, 50" TV with streaming capabilities, yoga mat, free weights, and board games. The perfect kid's escape!

At your home away from home in the Gold Coast, you'll be surrounded by fine dining, cultural attractions, and less than a 10 minute walk to the beach, all while being only 3 miles from the center of the city.

Guests have full access to the house and back patio, with the exception of 2 locked storage spaces in the basement.

Only as needed, but always available.

We do not have dedicated parking spaces at the house and parking in the city can be tricky, so please be sure to read all posted signs before parking anywhere on the street to avoid being ticketed/towed. We recommend using parking apps like SpotHero or ParkWhiz to find parking spots around the city.

We are dog friendly and there is a $125 dog fee, per dog (2 dogs max). This does not cover any damage or yard clean up and all dogs must be house trained. If you are bringing your pup along, we must know at the time of booking and prior to your arrival.

We have installed exterior only security cameras for the safety of both guest and property. These cameras are actively recording both audio and video on all exterior entrances and side doors. Any tampering with cameras, including, but not limited to covering and otherwise disabling of these cameras are grounds for early termination of reservation with no refunds whatsoever.

Absolutely no smoking inside or near open exterior doors - there is a $250 fee if this is violated.

Welcome to The Orion! Guests must pass screening with ID. A $5,000 USD SECURITY DEPOSIT HOLD on major credit cards is required as per House Rules.

Discover urban excellence steps from your door. This upscale penthouse in the Central Loop offers quintessential Chicago living, with views of Millennium Park and "The Bean" from your balcony. Explore Michigan Avenue, theaters, museums, restaurants, and shopping, all at your fingertips.
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
Cloud9 House Rules
1. Trust and Safety: Prior to accepting a reservation, we conduct thorough screening of every guest to ensure that they comply with our policies. We do not permit anyone with a criminal record to stay on our properties. By submitting your personal information, you consent to our performing background checks to verify your identity, criminal history, and other relevant information. If you or any of the guests fail to provide the required information within 24 hours of booking and do not pass the screening procedures, you will be required to cancel your reservation and bear any associated costs according to the cancellation policy.  If the required information is not submitted through our pre-check-in process prior to 24 hours before check in or if the screening is not passed, the booking will need to be cancelled by the guest, and full cancellation fees will apply.

2. Information Request: All guests, including those staying or visiting, are required to send identification for a trust and safety check. For safety and security reasons, only registered guests are allowed on the property Acceptable forms of identification include a driver's license, state ID, and/or passport. For guests under the age of 18, we require their name and age for registration purposes. The building management may request additional information for identity verification and check-in purposes, if deemed necessary. Failure to provide the required identification and information will result in the cancellation of the booking by the Guest. The guest will be responsible for any associated costs and penalties resulting from the cancellation.
3. Security Deposit: A damage deposit of USD 5000 is mandatory for all bookings and must be approved prior to check-in. By making a reservation, guests agrees to the hold upon a major credit card for the required deposit to cover any potential damages to the property or the building during their stay. If guests do not agree to this payment, they must cancel their booking, the terms of our cancellation policy, as posted on the booking platform, will apply in these circumstances. For the purpose of holding the damage deposit, the credit card used to make the booking must be in the name of the Primary Guest, and a picture of the credit card back and front should be included in the pre-checkin process. We take the responsibility of holding onto these funds seriously and will only use them to cover damages or other fees incurred during the guests' stay. If no damages are incurred, the deposit will be fully refunded within a reasonable timeframe following the conclusion of the guests' stay. If a damage was caused by the guest or any occupant of the unit, and the booking was done through Airbnb, we will proceed to ask for the payment directly through the platform. If the guest does not accept the payment or if Airbnb does not cover the damage, we are authorized to charge the guest directly from the deposit.
4. Cancellation Policy: For guests who make reservations through any booking engine different than direct bookings, the cancellation policy will be clearly posted and available for review prior to booking. For guests who make reservations directly with us, the following policy applies: 50% refund for cancellations made within 48 hours of booking, if the check-in date is at least 21 days away. If the guest postpones their booking for later than 21 days from the original check-in date and then cancels the booking, a 75% refund cancellation fee will apply. No refunds for cancellations made within 21 days of check-in.
5. Check-In and Check-Out Policy: Check-in is available any time after 4:00 PM and before 10:00 PM. Check-out must be completed any time before 11:00 AM. Guests who require an earlier check-in or later check-out time must send a request at least 24 hours prior to their desired check-in or check-out time. Please note that this request does not guarantee approval for an earlier check-in or late check-out. An earlier check-in or later check-out time is subject to availability and may incur an additional charge. Unauthorized late check-out may result in delays in the cleaning of the unit and additional charges. If a guest checks out later than 1:00 PM without prior authorization, they will be charged for an additional night's stay.
6. Prohibitions and violations 
- Parties, gatherings, or events are strictly prohibited on the premises and will result in the forfeiture of the full security deposit and any additional fines set by the condominium rules and regulations where the property is located, and termination of the stay without a refund. Any noise complaints from neighbors or building management may result in termination of the stay without a refund.
- Pets are strictly prohibited on the premises, with the exception of certified service animals, if you have a service animal, please notify the host prior to check-in. Failure to do so will result in a cancellation by the Guests the terms of our cancellation policy, as posted on the booking platform, will apply in these circumstances.
- If the number of guests listed on the reservation exceeds the maximum occupancy will result in a fine equivalent to the full deposit amount a cancellation by the Guests the terms of our cancellation policy, as posted on the booking platform, will apply in these circumstances.
- Additional cleaning fees may apply if extra cleaning is required, at a cost of USD$100 per hour, depending on the unit or more if special cleaning services were required . For stays longer than four weeks, a mandatory cleaning service is required every two weeks, with costs varying depending on the unit and to be informed by the host prior to check-in. Failure to comply with the mandatory cleaning service may result in termination of the stay without a refund.
- Smoking and vaping of any kind are strictly prohibited within the unit and the building. Any violation will result in an immediate fine of USD$500 per occurrence and termination of the stay without a refund.
- Any lost or missing keys, fobs, parking cards, or electronic devices will result in an immediate fee of USD$100 each to replace, which will be taken from the deposit.
- The guest is solely responsible for any damage or loss of property during their stay. The host reserves the right to deduct the cost of damages from the security deposit, and in case of insufficient funds, the guest will be responsible for paying the remaining balance. This is applicable only if the damage claim is not processed through Airbnb (when applicable). 
- Quiet Hours and Occupancy Limits: To ensure a peaceful environment, quiet hours are enforced from 10 pm to 8 am, and guests are asked to be considerate of our neighbors. Non registered occupants will be asked to vacate the property, transient visitors are allowed under the condition to comply with the maximum occupancy limit and leave the premisses at 10pm. If the visitor stays further than 10pm it will be charged as extra guest. 
- Zero-Tolerance Policy:The guests agree to refrain from any disrespectful, illegal, or inappropriate behavior towards any neighbors, residents, building managers, host, or its representatives. Any such behavior will result in immediate termination of the stay without a refund.

7. 	The guests acknowledge that their behavior is a material term of this agreement and that any breach of this term may result in damages and losses to the Host. The guests agree to indemnify and hold harmless the Host for any damages, losses, or costs that may result from the guests' disrespectful or inappropriate behavior.

8. Failure to abide by any of the house rules may result in the immediate cancellation of your stay without a refund. By making a reservation with us, you are acknowledging and agreeing to comply with all of the above-listed house rules.

Please note that there are cleaning services that will be available on request and with an additional cost .

sectionedDescription.description:
Our 4 bedroom, 4 bath condo Duplex is Perfect for large families, event goers, and business travelers needing a place to rest or work. Lovely, mature, elegant & modern space! 5min walk to the Blue line Damen stop!

The private space has all new upgraded appliances, gas wolf range, subzero double fridge,  and all the essentials! It is on Wolcott Ave exactly between Milwaukee & Division.

Yes we are licensed and have a registration # with the city of Chicago # R20000058371.

Imagine two homes in one. These are two full condos connected inside by a stairway. That means two full living areas, two complete kitchens, and all amenities complete within the full duplex. Space is most often used by large business groups needing a large space for strategic meetings, large families traveling together that want amenities of a home,  large travel groups who want their privacy but also want to enjoy time together. Each of the two levels of the duplex has a complete set of two bedrooms, two baths, with living/kitchen areas. Those with difficulties with stairs will not be comfortable in this duplex.

Guests have full access to the entire duplex. The unit is also separated into two separate units for smaller groups feel free to see our other listing via our host page. There is zero shared space with anyone other than those included in the booking. Space is not for hosting large parties and guests with any suspicious profiles will NOT be approved. This includes those with zero reviews.

Central Wicker Park on the cross streets of Wolcott and Ellen, literally between Division and Milwaukee Avenue. Actual Wicker Park itself is about 1 city block away and the closest Blue line stop is Damen. Walk score is 98!

Walk Score 98! Street parking only and it can be difficult to find. Note if renting a car to choose compact ideal and need to know how to parallel park a must in this area. True central Wicker Park experience.

Owners do live in the building. Only guests with multiple 5 star reviews will be considered. This is not a listing for brand new guests with no reviews. Condo building management does not allow for any parties and noise levels are monitored. No events hosted in this space allowed. And no smoking of any kind allowed in or near unit, patios, decks, or doors to building. Heavy fees and fines implemented for misuse of space.

primaryHost.about: I live in Chicago with my husband, three-year-old daughter, and six-month-old baby boy. We love to travel and love that Airbnb makes it so much simpler traveling with children. I am a host myself so I realize the importance of being respectful of other people's homes. Wherever we stay we treat our host's home as if it were our own.

sectionedDescription.access: You are welcome to use any space in the house. There will be a couple of closets locked, which contain our personal belongings.
sectionedDescription.description:
Arrive at the stately entryway setting a refined tone for this exquisite and luxurious house. Designer furniture, including a modern four-poster bed, and fittings, like a granite wet bar, accent the distinguished, thoughtfully curated atmosphere.

LOVE our coffee machine. If you are a coffee drinker you are in for a treat! It's a little complicated so if you need help the manual is in the drawer below the machine. Please make sure you clean after use, especially if you make Cappuccino since there will be milk in there and can spoil. Heated floors in the kitchen, foyer, and first floor master bath- just look for the thermostat with a foot on it. Smart TV's in living room and basement. We have cable or you can feel free to watch our Netflix account (to use Netflix sign in under "guest"). If you want to watch a 3D movie, glasses are in the basement media cabinet. Feel free to play pool, but please be careful with the table. You are welcome to use our extra large 27-inch iMac desktop computer (to use sign in under "guest"). Printer is also available.

You are welcome to use any space in the house. There will be a couple of closets locked, which contain our personal belongings.

When we have guests we will be either at our condo downtown or traveling. In any case, my relatives live nearby and we are also very close to our neighbors, so there is always someone available.

The house lies in the prime suburban location of Downers Grove next to Oakbrook with easy access to expressways. It’s an easy walk to numerous franchise restaurants and the famous Oberweis ice cream parlor. The Metra train serves downtown Chicago.

You can easily catch the Metra train from downtown Downers Grove to downtown Chicago.

In case of emergencies call 911 from your cell phone. Please note that there is no house phone. The nearest hospital is Good Samaritan, which is on the corner of 39th Street and Highland Avenue (3815 Highland Ave, Downers Grove, IL 60515).

sectionedDescription.houseRules:
Absolutely no parties.

No smoking anywhere in the house. Fee for smoking: $500

Please don't move furniture other than chairs with out asking. 

Please take your shoes off, absolutely no high heels on the wood floor.

It is of course important to be respectful of the property.

No extra guest unless approved. 

$150 lost key fee

Missing, destroyed or stained towel: $18 per item.

Missing, destroyed or stained linens: $50 per item.

Missing, destroyed or stained comforter: $150 per item.

Stained couch: Subject to estimate + 20% inconvenience charge.  

Damage to wood tables: Subject to estimate + 20% inconvenience charge.

Damage to wood floors: Subject to estimate + 20% inconvenience charge.    

Please use a a coaster or placemat on tables and do not put anything hot on them without a trivet or a hot pad.

Late check out fee of $25 for every half hour.

Be respectful and courteous to neighbors. Other than that, please enjoy your stay.

Nestled in the premier location adjacent to Millennium Park, The Loop offers the ultimate rental living experience. With Lakefront paths, Riverwalk, Grant Park, Michigan Avenue, theaters, museums, restaurants, shopping, and much more at your doorstep, it's a true epitome of upscale urban living. Here, you can enjoy a lifestyle where theater, entertainment, recreation, and career opportunities are all just steps away.
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
Cloud9 House Rules
1. Trust and Safety: Prior to accepting a reservation, we conduct thorough screening of every guest to ensure that they comply with our policies. We do not permit anyone with a criminal record to stay on our properties. By submitting your personal information, you consent to our performing background checks to verify your identity, criminal history, and other relevant information. If you or any of the guests fail to provide the required information within 24 hours of booking and do not pass the screening procedures, you will be required to cancel your reservation and bear any associated costs according to the cancellation policy.  If the required information is not submitted through our pre-check-in process prior to 24 hours before check in or if the screening is not passed, the booking will need to be cancelled by the guest, and full cancellation fees will apply.

2. Information Request: All guests, including those staying or visiting, are required to send identification for a trust and safety check. For safety and security reasons, only registered guests are allowed on the property Acceptable forms of identification include a driver's license, state ID, and/or passport. For guests under the age of 18, we require their name and age for registration purposes. The building management may request additional information for identity verification and check-in purposes, if deemed necessary. Failure to provide the required identification and information will result in the cancellation of the booking by the Guest. The guest will be responsible for any associated costs and penalties resulting from the cancellation.
3. Security Deposit: A damage deposit of USD 4000 is mandatory for all bookings and must be approved prior to check-in. By making a reservation, guests agrees to the hold upon a major credit card for the required deposit to cover any potential damages to the property or the building during their stay. If guests do not agree to this payment, they must cancel their booking, the terms of our cancellation policy, as posted on the booking platform, will apply in these circumstances. For the purpose of holding the damage deposit, the credit card used to make the booking must be in the name of the Primary Guest, and a picture of the credit card back and front should be included in the pre-checkin process. We take the responsibility of holding onto these funds seriously and will only use them to cover damages or other fees incurred during the guests' stay. If no damages are incurred, the deposit will be fully refunded within a reasonable timeframe following the conclusion of the guests' stay. If a damage was caused by the guest or any occupant of the unit, and the booking was done through Airbnb, we will proceed to ask for the payment directly through the platform. If the guest does not accept the payment or if Airbnb does not cover the damage, we are authorized to charge the guest directly from the deposit.
4. Cancellation Policy: For guests who make reservations through any booking engine different than direct bookings, the cancellation policy will be clearly posted and available for review prior to booking. For guests who make reservations directly with us, the following policy applies: 50% refund for cancellations made within 48 hours of booking, if the check-in date is at least 21 days away. If the guest postpones their booking for later than 21 days from the original check-in date and then cancels the booking, a 75% refund cancellation fee will apply. No refunds for cancellations made within 21 days of check-in.
5. Check-In and Check-Out Policy: Check-in is available any time after 4:00 PM and before 10:00 PM. Check-out must be completed any time before 11:00 AM. Guests who require an earlier check-in or later check-out time must send a request at least 24 hours prior to their desired check-in or check-out time. Please note that this request does not guarantee approval for an earlier check-in or late check-out. An earlier check-in or later check-out time is subject to availability and may incur an additional charge. Unauthorized late check-out may result in delays in the cleaning of the unit and additional charges. If a guest checks out later than 1:00 PM without prior authorization, they will be charged for an additional night's stay.
6. Prohibitions and violations 
- Parties, gatherings, or events are strictly prohibited on the premises and will result in the forfeiture of the full security deposit and any additional fines set by the condominium rules and regulations where the property is located, and termination of the stay without a refund. Any noise complaints from neighbors or building management may result in termination of the stay without a refund.
- Pets are strictly prohibited on the premises, with the exception of certified service animals, if you have a service animal, please notify the host prior to check-in. Failure to do so will result in a cancellation by the Guests the terms of our cancellation policy, as posted on the booking platform, will apply in these circumstances.
- If the number of guests listed on the reservation exceeds the maximum occupancy will result in a fine equivalent to the full deposit amount a cancellation by the Guests the terms of our cancellation policy, as posted on the booking platform, will apply in these circumstances.
- Additional cleaning fees may apply if extra cleaning is required, at a cost of USD$100 per hour, depending on the unit or more if special cleaning services were required . For stays longer than four weeks, a mandatory cleaning service is required every two weeks, with costs varying depending on the unit and to be informed by the host prior to check-in. Failure to comply with the mandatory cleaning service may result in termination of the stay without a refund.
- Smoking and vaping of any kind are strictly prohibited within the unit and the building. Any violation will result in an immediate fine of USD$500 per occurrence and termination of the stay without a refund.
- Any lost or missing keys, fobs, parking cards, or electronic devices will result in an immediate fee of USD$150 each to replace, which will be taken from the deposit.
- The guest is solely responsible for any damage or loss of property during their stay. The host reserves the right to deduct the cost of damages from the security deposit, and in case of insufficient funds, the guest will be responsible for paying the remaining balance. This is applicable only if the damage claim is not processed through Airbnb (when applicable). 
- Quiet Hours and Occupancy Limits: To ensure a peaceful environment, quiet hours are enforced from 10 pm to 8 am, and guests are asked to be considerate of our neighbors. Non registered occupants will be asked to vacate the property, transient visitors are allowed under the condition to comply with the maximum occupancy limit and leave the premisses at 10pm. If the visitor stays further than 10pm it will be charged as extra guest. 
-Zero-Tolerance Policy: Guests are expected to refrain from engaging in any form of disrespectful, illegal, or inappropriate behavior towards neighbors, residents, building management, hosts, or any representatives of our organization. Any instance of such behavior warrants the immediate termination of the stay, without the possibility of a refund.
Guests are explicitly aware that their conduct constitutes a fundamental condition of this agreement, and any violation of this condition may result in damages and losses for the host. Guests further commit to indemnify and absolve the host from any damages, losses, or associated costs arising from their disrespectful or inappropriate behavior. In the event of a breach of the zero-tolerance policy, the full deposit shall be forfeited.


7. 	The guests acknowledge that their behavior is a material term of this agreement and that any breach of this term may result in damages and losses to the Host. The guests agree to indemnify and hold harmless the Host for any damages, losses, or costs that may result from the guests' disrespectful or inappropriate behavior.

8. Failure to abide by any of the house rules may result in the immediate cancellation of your stay without a refund. By making a reservation with us, you are acknowledging and agreeing to comply with all of the above-listed house rules.

sectionedDescription.access:
You’ll have total access to this beautiful home. Everything you’ll ever need for a stay. Brand new Krupps coffee maker and a HAIR dryer in both bathrooms. 

All of the kitchen utensils have been newly purchased.
sectionedDescription.description:
This stunning home was totally renovated from top to bottom in 2019. 

We are centrally located in Southwest Houston. Approximately located within 5 miles of the Galleria,  Downtown and the Medical Center. 

-Allergy Free Floors
-New Granite Kitchen
 -New appliances
 -Spacious new bathrooms
 -Master Bedroom w/ private Bath. 
 -Large Manicured Green Backyard 
 
Absolutely no parties, gatherings or social events of any kind in this home.
Protected by:

 Http://Www.Disinfectandsheield.com

You’ll enjoy the fresh openness of this home. This is a wonderful community with many longtime friendly residents working in the medical center and surrounding industries.  This home is in walking distance to a popular city coffee shop as well as  24 hour grocery store.

You’ll have total access to this beautiful home. Everything you’ll ever need for a stay. Brand new Krupps coffee maker and a HAIR dryer in both bathrooms. 

All of the kitchen utensils have been newly purchased.

We are generally within one mile of this home and will always be a phone call or text away.

Our place he extremely close to the medical center. There is public transportation nearby if needed. Walking distances to hair salons, nail solons, CVS and Walmart Grocery market.

The best way of getting around Houston is with a car. Everywhere you go there is plenty of parking and you’ll want to stay cool in the summers.

Very well established, quiet, well maintained and manicured neighborhood.  

We are very close to the Galleria, Downtown Houston Theaters, the Houston Medical Center,  NRG Stadium, Houston Zoo, the Houston Art and Science Museums, and Minute Maid Park.  

NASA Space Center, Kemah Boardwalk and Clear Lake are approximately a 40 minute drive and  to Galveston and the Strand being an hour away or 20 minutes further.
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
This is a non smoking property, strictly no parties or gathering of more than 8 people.

Some small dog allowed under 25 lbs. 
Pets must be house training. 

All dog droppings must be picked up and placed in plastic bags and thrown in trash, not left in yard. 

Pets that shed, it is the renters responsibility to clean dog hair, or be assed a separate cleaning fee. 

Pets over 25 lbs. will be considered, please contact owner. 

Sorry no feline friends allowed because of allergies. 

Absolutely no parties or social gatherings.

A home EMERGENCY POWER GENERATOR, in case of Houston area POWER OUTAGES for any reason.
Comfortable seating with a wood burning fireplace and 65” TCL Roku Streaming Service!! Watch you favorite shows.
Absolutely beautiful easy to cook in New granite kitchen with all new appliances and energy efficient convection style cooktop!!

This beautifully decorated has a wonderful closet and beautiful Queen size bed.

All modern laundry with gas dryer. The laundry room also has a brand new steam iron and ironing board.
This recently updated walk in shower is part of the master bathroom.
Recently updated brand new twin bathroom sinks on granite countertops complete with shower and full tub.
Very open and modesty decorated, you will have all the comforts of home. Dining room has plenty of seating available.
Well manicured grassy back yard. The home also features a whole HOUSE EMERGENCY POWER GENERATOR, in case of POWER OUTAGES.
Electrically remote operated privacy gated driveway to two car garage, with covered breezeway to back door.

sectionedDescription.access: Digital pin pad makes entry and exit a breeze!
sectionedDescription.description:
Maddox, by WanderJaunt

At WanderJaunt, it's our mission to provide convenient and comfy homes, wherever you may be! We believe in the power of technology and human empathy to create seamless experiences, offering a variety of services like our virtual front desk and in-house customer support to the tens of thousands of guests we’ve hosted to date. Finding the perfect accommodations shouldn’t be difficult. We’re here to make it easy!

Each WanderJaunt comes stocked with all the basics you will need for your stay, and then some! No need to fret over those little details. We provide:

-WiFi
-HDTV equipped with AT&T TV Now
-Fully stocked kitchen, including cookware, dishes and cutlery
-Complimentary coffee
-Bath essentials, linens, hangers, a hair dryer and ironing board

Digital pin pad makes entry and exit a breeze!

We will always respect your privacy and leave you to enjoy your WanderJaunt in peace. Should anything come up during your stay - be it the need for extra towels, a light bulb burning out, or even local recommendations - drop us a line anytime! Our support team is standing by to help resolve any and all issues.

Please be aware of the following before booking:

Guests who book on the same day of their arrival may have their check-in time pushed to 7PM or 3 hours after booking - whichever is later.

We also ask all guests to agree to our terms of service, privacy policy, and house rules upon booking on our 3rd party website.
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
play safe!
When you book this reservation, you take full responsibility for any bumps, bruises, accidents, or illnesses that occur in your WanderJaunt and any amenity spaces offered with your WanderJaunt (including, but not limited to gym, pool, etc.). If you notice anything that presents a danger yourself, anyone traveling with you, or your WanderJaunt, please let us know as soon as you check in. *Please note: Breaking any of the following rules will incur a $500 fee. We also ask all guests to agree to our terms of service, privacy policy, and house rules upon booking on our 3rd party website.

change of plans?
If you decide to extend your stay after check-in, please contact us. We will do our best to accommodate you, but no promises!

same-day check-in
Guests who book on the same day of their arrival may have their check-in time pushed to 7PM or 3 hours after booking - whichever is later.

checkout is at 11 am
Late checkouts will delay our cleaning professionals and result in a $50 charge for each hour.

no smoking of any kind
All WanderJaunts are non-smoking units. Leaving behind a smoky WanderJaunt incurs a $500 fine. Please also be aware if the surrounding community is a non-smoking community.

a clean home is a happy home
If your WanderJaunt is left in a messy state beyond what is reasonable, we will charge an extra cleaning fee.

mind the neighbors, please!
Parties AND/or excessive noise ARE NOT allowed in WanderJaunts. Misbehavior costs $500.

no pets allowed
We know you love your fuzzy friends, but this is a trip for you! Our WanderJaunts are for human-use only. Breaking this rule costs $500

stay between 68°f and 80°f
Turning the temperature past these set points can create a system failure and a very uncomfortable stay.

swim at your own risk
Guests agree to waive any responsibility of WanderJaunt and/or the property owner when using the pool and/or hot tub.

Should anything come up during your stay - be it the need for extra towels, a light bulb burning out, or even local recommendations - drop us a line anytime! Our support team is standing by to help resolve any and all issues.

sectionedDescription.access:
You will have access to the entire apartment and all the amenities ! :
-  The Master Bedroom which has a 43 inch Roku Tv , as well as a walk in closet with hangers, umbrella , and laundry hamper. 
( the en suite bathroom is a full bathroom ) 
- The 2nd Bedroom which has a 43 inch Roku Tv  & a walk in closet with hangers , umbrella and laundry hamper. 
- The second bathroom is a full bath with a lien closet as well. 
-  A Kitchen ( fully stocked with pots , pans , dishes and utensils) 
- Dining room 
- living room with fire place 
- Private balcony 
- The fitness center 
- Pool area with grill
sectionedDescription.description:
Welcome to your home away from home! Only difference is your minutes away from all of lifes neccesties. Not to mention the 8 major hospitals , the NRG Stadium , museums, restaurants , food trucks and a convince store walking distance. Inside the spacious apartment you will find everything you can think of in the kitchen , down to board games. You & your guest will have access to all these amenities FREE of charge : 
Parking (s)
2 Pools 
24 hour Gym 
Mail Room 
Lounge 
Dog Park

You will have access to the entire apartment and all the amenities ! :
-  The Master Bedroom which has a 43 inch Roku Tv , as well as a walk in closet with hangers, umbrella , and laundry hamper. 
( the en suite bathroom is a full bathroom ) 
- The 2nd Bedroom which has a 43 inch Roku Tv  & a walk in closet with hangers , umbrella and laundry hamper. 
- The second bathroom is a full bath with a lien closet as well. 
-  A Kitchen ( fully stocked with pots , pans , dishes and utensils) 
- Dining room 
- living room with fire place 
- Private balcony 
- The fitness center 
- Pool area with grill
- Resident Lounge 
- Mail Room
